findings.title: Insecure Upgradeability Path
findings.description: Contract exposes upgrade/destroy behavior without strong authorization checks.
findings.recommendation: Protect update/destroy methods using strict witness checks and preferably multisig governance.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration applied: constraints=1, avg_complexity=5.00, peak_complexity=5, uncertainty=0.260, penalty=0.065, confidence 0.850->0.785.

findings.title: Missing Access Control
findings.description: Sensitive operations execute without Runtime.CheckWitness or equivalent guard.
findings.recommendation: Enforce authorization for state-changing and privileged methods.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration applied: constraints=2, avg_complexity=5.00, peak_complexity=5, uncertainty=0.344, penalty=0.086, confidence 0.850->0.764.

findings.title: Insecure Upgradeability Path
findings.description: Contract exposes upgrade/destroy behavior without strong authorization checks.
findings.recommendation: Protect update/destroy methods using strict witness checks and preferably multisig governance.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration retained baseline confidence 0.850; no symbolic constraints were observed.

findings.title: Potential Unbounded Loop
findings.description: Execution path depth=6 with loop back-edges detected.
findings.recommendation: Add bounded iteration checks and short-circuit exit conditions.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration retained baseline confidence 0.700; no symbolic constraints were observed.

findings.title: High GAS Consumption Path
findings.description: Execution path consumes approximately 98347 gas units.
findings.recommendation: Reduce expensive syscalls/loops and split heavy workflows.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration applied: constraints=2, avg_complexity=5.00, peak_complexity=5, uncertainty=0.344, penalty=0.086, confidence 0.700->0.614.

findings.title: Overly Broad Manifest Permissions
findings.description: Manifest allows unrestricted contract/method calls, expanding the callable trust surface.
findings.recommendation: Restrict manifest permissions to explicit contract hashes and method names.
findings.confidence_reason: Static confidence baseline 0.700; no execution-path uncertainty context.
